title: Task Manager
description: A task management application designed to help teams organize and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with React and Firebase for real-time updates.

title: Personal Blog
description: A personal blog platform that allows users to write and share articles. Built with Node.js and MongoDB, it features markdown support and user authentication.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: An e-commerce site that offers product browsing, cart management, and a secure checkout process. Built using React and Stripe for payment integration.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time messaging app using WebSockets and Node.js, allowing instant communication between users with features like private chats and group rooms.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase skills, projects, and experience. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a mobile-first design approach.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A mobile app that tracks daily activities, workouts, and nutrition. Built with React Native, it integrates with third-party APIs for tracking health data.

title: Budget Planner
description: A budgeting tool to help users track income and expenses. Built with Vue.js, it offers interactive charts and financial insights.

title: Recipe Finder
description: A recipe search engine that allows users to find recipes based on ingredients. Built with React and external APIs for pulling recipe data.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting app that provides real-time weather information based on location. Built with JavaScript and the OpenWeather API.

title: Online Learning Platform
description: A platform for online courses with features like video streaming, quizzes, and progress tracking. Built with Django and React for a seamless user experience.
